Name:
USS Dyson (DD-572)
Zerstörer 5 (D179)
Fate:
Transferred to West German Navy, 17 February 1960
Transferred to Greece for parts, February 1982
Range: 6,500 nmi (12,000 km; 7,500 mi) at 15 knots (28 km/h; 17 mph)
Armament:
5 × 5 in (127 mm)/38 cal. guns
10 × 40 mm AA guns
7 × 20 mm AA guns
10 × 21 in (533 mm) torpedo tubes
6 × depth charge projectors
2 × depth charge tracks
